Articles.Content:
Exceed 600.000,0 m/s without cheating.

Following Mods are allowed:

Deep Space

MechJeb

ZO2

How to proof:

Video on youtube

Pictures of ship in vab, in orbit and the 3 photos from the ship a light speed.

edit:

additionally you have to upload the ship

Edited September 14, 2012 by eyecikjou567

600k/s is not 2x the speed of light.

600.000k/s is (aproximately).

(599584916 m/s)

Speed of light is approximately 300,000,000 m/s, not 300,000 m/s.

In the paid version, this is not possible with any reasonable build. Even while sundiving, you probably won't crack 200,000 m/s.

Light speed is at about 300.000 Km/s sorry mixed up.

But you CAN crack even 700.000 m/s

edit:

you could use deep space mission pack with ion engine :?
